headline: C.H. Robinson Extends Dividend Streak As Capital Returns Stay In Focus
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (NasdaqGS:CHRW) has declared another uninterrupted and increasing dividend. This continues a dividend streak that has run for more than 25 years. The announcement extends the company's record of consistent cash returns to shareholders. For investors watching C.H. Robinson Worldwide at a share price of $200.59, the renewed dividend increase adds to an already strong period for the stock. The company has posted a 22.5% return year to date and 112.2% over the past year,...
